explains: n. （对法律、协议、原则等的）违背，违反；侵权行为，（对人权的）侵犯； （对某物的）损毁，（对圣地的）亵渎；强奸
wordGroup: in violation of adj. 违反（违背）
violation of laws 违法；违章
access violation 访问破坏；访问违例

sentences.en: To deprive the boy of his education is a violation of state law.
sentences.cn: 剥夺这个男孩的受教育权是一种违反州法律的行为。

sentences.en: The judge called the decision "a flagrant violation of international law."
sentences.cn: 法官称这个决定是“对国际法的公然违反”。

sentences.en: His possession of classified documents in his home was, at the very least, a violation of navy security regulations.
sentences.cn: 他把机密文件放在家里，这最起码是违反了海军安全条例。
